response.answer_text: The history of tie-dye is mostly associated with the 1950-60s hippie movement and what we commonly know as modern tie-dye now. But tying and dyeing fabrics have been around for as long as humans have been making fabrics. The earliest records are in Asia BC. They used plants and minerals to make dye baths to stain fabrics. Shibori was one of the first known tie and dye techniques.
tie-dyeing was actually invented in China’s T’ang Dynasty and it is one of the famous dyeing techniques of Japan and China.
